about_the_game:
Merging City is a chill strategic city building puzzle game with no worries of management.
You get to choose when to place land tiles and buildings tiles such as houses, shops and
factories, with no RNG. Expand and grow your city by getting points through placing buildings
to their desired location as each building tile has a specific synergy with other tiles or merge
the same buildings to upgrade their density to bigger buildings. The goal is to keep getting
points to keep growing your dream city.





Your start of the game by placing land on the hex grid. You are given limited land at the start.
So you should place them strategically so you will know where to place building tiles and
which suitable place will give you the most points or best to merge buildings.



From the start of every session till the end, you have full freedom to choose what building
tiles to place and when to place them. In this game currently you get to place three types of
buildings, either houses, shops or factory tiles. Each building tile type has a preference, so if
you place them to their most preferred location, then you will get a lot of points. For example
,houses really like having other house tiles next to each other leading you to get more points
however they do not like having factory tiles next to them, leading you to lose points.



One of the main highlights of Merging City, is merging two existing buildings of the same type
to increase their density or building size. Each building tile has 3 Densities. Low density,
medium density and high density. Each density has 3 levels. You also get points when you
merge.



When you place a building tile to its most desired location or merge two existing buildings of
the same type you are rewarded with points. In this game you will need to continuously
generate points to get Land tiles. So Place your tiles strategically so that you can keep
merging buildings, generate points and expand your ever growing city.

What Merging City Offers


  • Relaxing City building experience with no worry of City Management
  • Freedom to choose and when to place tiles with no RNG
  • Build an endless ever growing city with minimal strategy elements
  • Great to play in small sessions every now and then
  • Merge buildings and watch them grow to big buildings

What Merging City Does Not Offers


  • No city management
  • No complex resource management
  • No 4X Strategy
  • No RNG to place Tiles
  • No Trading

Merging City Draws Inspiration From Awesome Games Like


  • Dorf Romantik
  • Islanders
  • Tile Town
  • 2048 Game

  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or Ryzen 3 ( 2.0 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Integrated graphics card
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Not Required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Ryzen 5 ( 3.0 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 | AMD RX 580 | Intel UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Go Get One
